original_text: A bruised reed shall he not break, and the smoking flax shall he not quench: he shall bring forth judgment unto truth.
korean_text: 상한 갈대를 꺾지 아니하며 꺼져가는 등불을 끄지 아니하고 진실로 정의를 시행할 것이며

sentences.original_text: A bruised reed shall he not break
and smoking flax shall he not quench
he shall bring forth judgment unto truth
